akn:content.akn:p:
§ 30706. Exclusive right to name, seals, emblems, and badges The corporation has the exclusive right to use the name “Board for Fundamental Education” and seals, emblems, and badges the corporation adopts. (Pub. L. 105–225, Aug. 12, 1998, 112 Stat. 1323.)
